text: Michelle Hyland (born 29 March 1984) is a road cyclist from New Zealand. She represented her nation at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. She also rode at the 2005 and 2007 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1984 births Category:New Zealand female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Gisborne, New Zealand Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of New Zealand
title: Michelle Hyland
